DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate patient maintain Hb level 9.0 ~ 12.0 g/dl evaluation period
DOC.brief_title: Phase IV Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety Mircera PD
DOC.detailed_description: The secondary objective study - No patient mean Hb level +/-1.0g/dl difference baseline Hb - Incidence RBC transfusion titration evaluation period - Mean Hb total study period - Intrapatient Hb variability ( mean within-patient standard deviation Hb ) - Frequency Micera dose level - safety
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1.≥18 yr age 2.peritoneal dialysis ≥12wk screen baseline period 3.weekly Kt/V ≥1.8 PD patient 4.Baseline Hb concentration 9.0 12.0g/dl ( mean monthly Hb value determine month 2 1 ) 5.stable baseline Hb concentration ( define absolute difference ≤2g/dl Hb value determine month 2 1 ) 6.continuous subcutaneous maintenance epoetin darbepoetin therapy least 2 month screen baseline period 7.adequate iron status define serum ferritin ≥ 100ng/ml transferrin saturation≥20 % ( mean two value deteremined month 2 1 ) Exclusion criterion : 1.Overt gastrointestinal bleed bleed episode necessitate transfusion wihin 2 month screen baseline pereiod 2.RBC transfusion within 2 month screen baseline period 3.nonrenal cause anemia ( e.g folic acid vitamin B12 deficiency , hemolysis ) 4.acute infection chronic , uncontrolled symptomatic inflammatory disease ( e.g rhematoid arthritis , systemic lupus erythematosus ) 5.Creactive protein > 30mg/dl 6.poorly control hypertension necessitate interruption epotien darbepoetin 6 month screen 7.platelets > 500X109/L 8.pure red cell aplasia 9.chronic congestive heart failure ( New Yorj Heart Association class IV ) 10.Myocardial infarction , severe unstable coronary artery disease , stroke , severe liver disease within 3months screen baseline 11.Life expectancy < 12months
